items.summary: Save the newly uploaded BullBoost Performance logo image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png, replacing the existing file at that path. Update the BullBoost banner in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to display this new image. The banner must remain a clickable anchor tag linking to https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer', displayed alongside the existing eBay and Enjuku Racing sponsor banners in the horizontal sponsor row.
